Articles.Content:
What I want to ask is what do you think about Easter eggs in ksp

Should squad add more or what?

(Yes I know there very busy with other ksp stuff but once that's done)

What type of Easter eggs you would like to see added

Complacated puzzles, hidden images, hidden messages, story items or other

Please discuss

Ps if you can think of a better title please say.

I think there should be more, and they should show up on the map when you find them. Not automatically or anything, you have to - say - set them as a target to prove to the game that you actually found them and didn't just happen to orbit overhead. There also needs to be some mechanism for finding them other than "look for an odd pixel here and there." I'm not sure if ScanSat is the right way to do it, but something like that is better than what we have now.

They should also - at least sometimes - generate unique science.

Oh! And once you find KSC2 and the island runway, you should be able to launch from there. And the dozen or so other airports/launchpads you should be able to find on other continents
Interplanetary Puzzles to create a small Background Story would be nice.
There should be a way in stock KSP to find eastereggs without the need to cheat and look up their positions in the forum or something.

Moved to Development Discussions.

The entire point of an Easter Egg is that it should be extremely difficult to find on purpose without "cheating", as you say.
